blueprint.customerActions: Create a new (+) blueprint from the menu or start by editing this one.
blueprint.frontstageInteractions: Add stages as required using the '+ Add stage' button.
blueprint.backstageInteractions: Modify the contents of each stage using the 'Edit' button, '<' or '>' button to change the order.
blueprint.supportProcesses: Data persisted using local storage, or save your data and come back later.
blueprint.physicalEvidence: Built using Next.js, React, Tailwind, ChatGPT 4 and hosted on GitHub pages.
